rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0001
rows.name:
Grandpa's a lot livelier than he was
before!

rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0002
rows.name:
He's been going backstage a lot more
now too...

rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0003
rows.name:
And Mister Vandham's story's coming
along nicely!

rows.label: tlk00240107_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm looking forward to seeing it on
stage. You should come and see it too!
